text:
Currently using `resample_img` with `interpolation='continuous'` (default) can lead to values outside of the input range (e.g. getting negative values). `skimage` has a [`clip` option](http://scikit-image.org/docs/dev/api/skimage.transform.html?highlight=resize#skimage.transform.resize) which states:
>Whether to clip the output to the range of values of the input image. This is enabled by default, since higher order interpolation may produce values outside the given input range.
title: Offer clip option in resample_img

text: I don't see disadvantage in adding clipping t the resampling. Yet another argument added to the function signature, but calling it 'clipping' should be transparent enough.
